thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: BlackRock Backs a Startup to Find Out What Young Investors Want

author: Peter Rudegeair
title: BlackRock Backs a Startup to Find Out What Young Investors Want
text:
The world’s biggest money manager is buying a stake in a startup that invests its users’ pocket change, reinforcing a broader push by BlackRock Inc. to serve individual investors.
The investment in Acorns Grow Inc., which was announced Wednesday, is part of a $50 million fundraising round that BlackRock is leading. It is using its own money instead of client funds for the investment. BlackRock manages $6.3 trillion in assets.
